resources.string: Oh noes! There was a problem logging in.
There was an error retrieving events from the server.
You entered an incorrect username or password. Please try again.
An account already exists with that username. Please choose another.
Whoops. There was a problem registering account. Please try again later.
It looks like there are no events in your grapevine. Try adding some groups and we\'ll tell you what they\'ve planned :)
There was an error fetching your events from the server.
There was an error following this feed.
There was an error retrieving new events

Whoops. There was a problem trying to unfollow the feed.
You don\'t currently follow any feeds. Add some above to start getting events!
